definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Books and newspapers and television also teach us.
sentences.chinese: 書和報紙和電視還教本人們。

sentences.english: Only scripts for the object and its descendants can change the variable.
sentences.chinese: 只有對象本身和派生對象的教本能夠改變變量。

sentences.english: Migrating scripted, customised behaviours and existing product integrations.
sentences.chinese: 遷移教本語言的，自定義的行爲和現存的產品集成。

sentences.english: Sadly, there is little of this insight in textbooks of mathematics at all levels .
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，各種程度的數學教本都很少注意到這一點。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a kind of printed matter-textbook with pages for preparing lessons.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種印刷品即帶備課頁的教本。

definition: lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
imperial edict/see also 上諭|上谕[shang4 yu4]
Confucian study of ethics/study of Daoism/school for Daoism in Tang and Song times/Daoist magic/another name for 理學|理学, rational learning of Song dynasty neo-Confucianism
to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)
